allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Emscripten web build support and GitHub Actions deployment

- Add CMakeLists.txt for Emscripten builds with optimizations
- Implement non-blocking main loop using emscripten_set_main_loop
- Add custom HTML shell with proper canvas styling (no scrollbars)
- Configure 1024x768 resolution for web builds
- Add build scripts (build_web.ps1, serve.ps1)
- Fix platform-specific code for web compatibility
- Add GitHub Actions workflow for automated Pages deployment
- Update .gitignore to exclude build artifacts

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
